An assault involving several inmates occurred at a new prison unit meant to protect male juvenile offenders , sending one person to the hospital who was beaten with a padlock , the Iowa Department of Corrections confirmed Monday .
The altercation involving two groups of inmates broke out March 18 at the unit for 17 - year - old offenders at the Anamosa State Penitentiary , department spokesman Fred Scaletta said .
Scaletta said it 's not clear what prompted the assault , which he called a serious incident .
